website_summaries.verdict: Really nice price point for a soundbar. Easy unit to set up and begin using out of the box.
pros: Easy to stream music through the soundbar from a mobile device through a Bluetooth connection
Basic soundbar that will be easy to configure, while still delivering decent audio quality
Makes use of Adaptive Sound Control technology that matches the sound output to the type of audio being played
cons: Not really made for those seeking top-flight audio quality

customer_reviews.title: Sounded very muddy and less clear than the TV speakers ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounded very muddy and less clear than the TV speakers even after adjusting multiple settings. One of the speakers rattled and had to return it which was a nightmare because they didn't offer UPS pick up. Had to lug this thing to the store. I would recomend the slightly more expensive Samsung soundbar with the wireless sub.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Decent speaker for the price. But I would recommend spending more money and getting something more powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works well for the price. I think if I were to do it again, I would spend more money and buy more powerful speaker. Most media it works great for, but for some it's barely louder than the TVs built in speaker. Works great for a small room. But if you are like me and have a noisy wall air-conditioner and traffic noise outside, I would invest in a more powerful speaker. I also find it irritating having to point the remote at such a specific spot before it will work. I'm mostly happy with it, but I do wish I did more research before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you want something that will get the girls dancing in your living room.. this isn't it.'
customer_reviews.text: Its ideal for a small to medium sized bedroom, and not for your main entertainment set up in the living room. Well, not for me since i have a 30ft high ceiling. Despite everyone telling me that it cannot work, I got it to work with my projector via its headphone outlet using an Analog to to Digital converter. You also have to max the volume up enable to get a fuller sound from it. Maybe because I'm a musician and i'm used to hearing big sounds all the time. This will work perfectly depending on your application.
customer_reviews.author: diegOdariO SnapShotS

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice
customer_reviews.text: I have heard better sound, but this was for my grandma and I like that you can use your own remote instead of it having it’s own. When you turn the TV off, the soundbar goes off. There’s no super intrusive light on it. It makes it loud enough for her to hear. Also, the subwoofer is wired to the speaker so there’s no lag on the sound like you get with Bluetooth. If you don’t need surround sound and need a simple setup, this is a good choice
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar for the price, especially with subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and a great subwoofer all for a great price. The soundbar is kinda finnicky, there is no number displayed on it and you have to either press the button a lot or hold it down to make the volume change. Overall though, I really like it, it is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Favero

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Works well with my xbox one via optical port. Gave 4 stars since I was missing screws, but not a big deal. Remote is clunky and the sensor range is short. I would recommend this as a temporary audio system (college, apartment etc...) and then upgrade to something better once you become a homeowner. I will update later to see if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound.
customer_reviews.text: When I unhooked this soundbar from our tv, my girlfriend came home, turned on Netflix and said "Why does the sound bar sound so bad?". So even to her non-audiophile ears, the speakers on our tv were a massive downgrade from this soundbar and we have a Samsung 4k. This was a smart purchase and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I went with LG because of the ease of syncing it with my LG TV. Hooked it up with the included optical cable and I was off and running. I'm giving it 4stars instead of 5 because the audio quality isn't absolutely top tier. Regardless, this unit works well and definitely improves upon my TVs built in speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Powers

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not great by far
customer_reviews.text: to be honest, I have a computer speaker system that will blow this thing off the wall. I expected a lot better sound matching it with our huge flat screen LG brand TV. Not really disappointed too bad, but I can't believe it doesn't have any more bass than it does
customer_reviews.author: Capt. RL

customer_reviews.title: but LG Sound bar is great. I have subwoofer placed behind t
customer_reviews.text: Nothing against sound bar, but LG Sound bar is great. I have subwoofer placed behind t.v. I had to install small bumpers to keep bar from vibrating off shelf in cinema mode.
customer_reviews.author: doug chase

customer_reviews.title: Good price and hooked up very easily
customer_reviews.text: Good price and hooked up very easily... but the sounds always seems... off. Not very good for music, movies or TV really. I was expecting a lot more. Voices come through cleaner on my computer speakers plugged into a TV than on this thing... sad really.
customer_reviews.author: M. Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Sound oscillates and it's very annoying
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the supplied audio cable to connect it to my tv and I noticed that sometimes the sound oscillates a little which is very annoying (like an old tape player that chews the tape). Anyone knows a fix? or is this a defective unit/cable?
customer_reviews.author: Max G.

customer_reviews.title: but it's not all that loud and honestly I don't think it sounds that great. Give then price point though I give it ...
customer_reviews.text: For a cheaper sound-bar I guess this is okay... but it's not all that loud and honestly I don't think it sounds that great. Give then price point though I give it 4 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: ... this a couple hours ago and it was incredibly easy to set up and the sound
customer_reviews.text: I just received this a couple hours ago and it was incredibly easy to set up and the sound, unfingbelievable, I have a 5.1 surround sound system in the other room that cost 5 times this about 8 years ago, this sound bar blows that away, the sound!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A good LG sound bar but bad volume control
customer_reviews.text: The sound level rises and falls uncontrollably by itself. This is referenced in a Google search for this product but the solution is not for the unskilled person.
customer_reviews.author: John Weersing

customer_reviews.title: Clarity
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was not as sharp as I was expecting. Some voices sound garbled and difficult to understand to me. Could be just me.
customer_reviews.author: BillL41

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay I guess.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not some sort of audiophile, I just wanted something better than the TV speakers. This is better than the TV speakers 90% of the time. Sometimes the speaker buzzes annoyingly. It is also difficult to tell when you are changing the volume, there is only one tiny red light to acknowledge the change that you have to see from across the room. Not the best, but better than TV speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thomas H Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good for the price, cinema mode is suuuuper low toned, hard to hear dialogue. go with standard mode and turn down the bass. kind of eliminates subwoofer, which is a drag, but it's a $100 speaker - so, ya... Still an upgrade to on-board TV audio
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Guinta

customer_reviews.title: Small room only (IMHO)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my living-room; I don't have a huge room - its avg size. This was NOT anywhere near what I wanted for that room. Transferred it to the dining room / kitchen TV and it is fine for that room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good.....wish it was louder
customer_reviews.text: I think it's fine, my husband wishes he could turn it up louder. It does have a good sound to it.
customer_reviews.author: T.  Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging, easy install, puts out a lot of clear and room filling sound.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Regner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this bar enhaces my tv tremendously - i bought one for my brother and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: raymond yovanovich

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little old dtyle but sound great !! for the preice , not to fond of the packing !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ross H Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son bought me this as a Christmas gift and Im satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D.Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goodf Product Good Price not for you if your an audiophile I AINT!
customer_reviews.author: Russ Godsil

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: No problems so far, sound quality is decent, lacks punch but okay for tv watching
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: This sucks. Sound is awful
customer_reviews.text: This sucks. Sound is awful. Have to adjust all the time. Really poor quality. Company won't let me return without spending aprox $50.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with aux cord, buttons are hard to see, otherwise great speakers
customer_reviews.author: zachary

customer_reviews.title: So far it's great Watched a transformers movie LOUD Was a cinema experience
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great Watched a transformers movie LOUD Was a cinema experience
customer_reviews.author: CGarcia

customer_reviews.title: great bar
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and sounds great. I have had no issues with it and enjoy the volume control. Sound bar syncs with my LG tv.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Golfin

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Returned it the same day it arrived. Remote didn't work and Subwoofer didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Dr BobP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic addtion to my new 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 4K Proscan TV a few weeks ago and decided to boost the sound with a sound bar and subwoofer. Excellent decision! I have only one problem with the sound bar. I couldn't get the optical cable to stay in the back of it, but I wrapped it and secured with the tape that came off the packaging and it has been fine ever since. The sub booms and the sound bar is clear. This is why I love LG!
customer_reviews.author: Jamele R. Little

customer_reviews.title: Full sound theater for single room
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Easy to setup and the most important include bass
customer_reviews.author: TomRC150

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy hook up to tv connects blue tooth or wire Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: jesse j stager

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't sound how I spected, too much bass and no clear sound. More noise than definition.
customer_reviews.author: Néstor Luis Alfonzo Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought refurb unit and it crackles during hi treble movie scenes
customer_reviews.author: David Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware you get what you pay for or less.
customer_reviews.text: Bass sounds like a speaker in a box. No real quality and has no loudness what so ever. I don't know where all these great reviews are coming from but for a few more dollars can get the samsung brand with much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The soundbar is compact and provides excellent sound in contrast to the built in television speaker. The included subwoofer doesn't add a great deal of bass, but lends a warmth to the audio overall that is actually very welcomed. The set paired with my television seemlessly and is controlled by the "magic remote" with no issues. Overall a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installed this under my LG TV. Sounds great easy to install. You will need to access the LG website to obtain a full owners manual and get instructions on how to hang the sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: zag1999

customer_reviews.title: Bad value.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price, even refurbished. Low volume, sounds cheap, sounds bad. Wish I had gotten something else.
customer_reviews.author: K. Steele

customer_reviews.title: I took a chance hoping it would work fine, but it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Cuts in and out. It was refurbished, I took a chance hoping it would work fine, but it doesn't. Sounds great when it works though.
customer_reviews.author: Arber Sinani

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Unassuming Sound Bar With Sub Woofer System
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reasonably priced sound bar and found this. Very easy to set up. Sound bar slid under my Samsung 55" TV. Subwoofer is small enough to hide almost anywhere. It is not powered but hooks up with sound bar like a remote wired speaker. At a reasonable volume sound bar adds a little more depth to sound. Only two settings Cinema and Standard. If one wishes a Stadium setting or a window-rattling sub woofer then one needs to look for a powered subwoofer with Bluetooth. For me this system is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: denis33

customer_reviews.title: Just a crap show
customer_reviews.text: It does not work the remote never worked!! it’s taking for ever go get it returned, and refunded. WORST EVER DO NOT BUY A CONPLETE RIP OFF ARTISTS
customer_reviews.author: G wood

product_meta.title: LG Electronics SH2 2.1 Channel 100W Sound Bar (Renewed)
product_meta.description: The SH2 combines performance and convenience in a stylish sound bar. The 100 watt sound bar also has a wired sub-woofer to add the sonic depth of bass. Fill the room with music for everyone to enjoy, by streaming tunes from Bluetooth enabled devices like a smartphone or tablet.
feature_bullets: This Certified Refurbished product has been tested and certified to work and look like new, with minimal to no signs of wear, by a manufacturer or specialized third-party seller approved by Amazon. The product is backed by a minimum 90-day warranty, and may arrive in a generic brown or white box.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
